approved_projects.en: The Discovery Tool is only available for use in approved projects.

clear_device.en: Reset Databases? All Discovery Tool data saved on this device will be deleted and reset. Click 'Continue' to proceed.

consent_info_1.en: Use the Discovery Tool to take photos and explain things in your community that affect healthy living. The Discovery Tool will make a map of your route.

consent_info_2.en: The information you collect will be stored securely at Stanford University and will only be used for research purposes. It may be published or presented, but your identity will never be shared.

delete_all_attached.en: This will delete the photo and any attached information.

finish_info_1.en: From home screen, connect to wifi to upload data.

good_or_bad.en: Is this good or bad for the community?

instructions_upload.en: Data automatically uploaded when network connection is stable.

more_info.en: For more information please visit http://ourvoice.stanford.edu

saftey_tips_1.en: Walk with another person, if possible

saftey_tips_2.en: Pay attention and avoid dangerous situations

saftey_tips_3.en: Do not take photos of people's faces

saftey_tips_4.en: Ask for help if you need it

thanks_interest.en: Thank you for your interest in the Discovery Tool!

why_this_photo.en: Why did you take this photo?

no_edit.en: Changes to this Walk/Photo can no longer be saved

no_photos_yet.en: No photos in current walk yet
